name: Jewels Magic: Mystery Match3
description:
Magical, bejeweled visuals with brilliant levels!

Play the bedazzled edition of the classic match-3 puzzle game with endless exciting adventures to find and create mystical gems!
Become the jewel master and unlock all the levels in this jewel saga game!
All kinds of surprises and mystery lay in wait as you explore the magical jewelry world.

Starting now, enjoy brilliant jewel designs and addictive puzzle levels anytime, anywhere for FREE!


HOW TO PLAY
- Match 3+ jewels in a line to crush them.
- Match 4 jewels to create special Lightning Jewels that can blast all the jewels in a row or column.
- Match 5 jewels with L shape to create special Jewel Bomb that can blast all the surrounding jewels.
- Match 5 jewels with T shape to create special X Jewel Bomb that can blast all the jewels on a diagonal.
- Match 5 jewels in a line to create special Rainbow Jewels that can blast all the jewels of the same color.
- Combine 2 special jewels together to create stunningly fantastic effects.


FEATURES
- Fun for all ages!
- Create all kinds of powerful special boosters and gorgeous combinations.
- Over 200 jewel quest levels with weekly updates.
- No WiFi required. Enjoy anytime, anywhere, even offline!
- No time limit! Play at your own pace.
- Earn daily bonuses and rewards.
- Engage with millions of others players around the world.


NOTES
Jewels Magic: Mystery Match 3 contains the ad like interstitial, video and house ads.
Jewels Magic: Mystery Match 3 is free to play, but you can purchase in-app items like AD FREE and coins

SUPPORT UNIVERSAL APP
• Enjoy the game on various devices (phones and tablets).
